description: Requests for a patient's Hospice Non-Covered Documentation.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HSPC_NONCVRD_REQ_C_NAME
columns.description:
The hospice non-covered request type category ID for the episode.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient Requested During Election Period


Patient Requested After Election Period


Third Party Provider


Update To Patient Request

columns.name: HSPC_NONCVRD_ROI_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the release of information record associated with the hospice non-covered request.
